title: Rock Creek Park: Meeting Notices
body: Meeting Notices:       The National Park Service (NPS) is planning to undertake Phase V of the preservation of Meridian Hill Park. The NPS is proposing to continue repairs to the exposed aggregate concrete throughout the park, stabilize historic features, and install an American Disability Act (ADA) accessible entrance into the lower level of the park.   Please join us at the following Open House: January 14, 2014 from 6:30 pm to 8:00 pm 1401 Florida Avene, N. W. (corner of 14th Street and Florida Avenue, NW) (Moshe Zusman Photography Studio) Washington, D.C. 20009  The National Park Service is inviting comments during a 30-day public comment period through February 9, 2014. For more information, please visit the National Park Service Planning, Environment and Public Comment website: http://parkplanning.nps.gov/MeridianHParkPhaseV
